verses.verse: And SHimshon <WH8123> went down <WH3381> <WH8799> to Timnath <WH8553>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> a woman <WH802> in Timnath <WH8553> of the daughters <WH1323> of the Philistines <WH6430>.

And he came up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and told <WH5046> <WH8686> his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> a woman <WH802> in Timnath <WH8553> of the daughters <WH1323> of the Philistines <WH6430>: now therefore get <WH3947> <WH8798> her for me to wife <WH802>.

Then his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Is there never <WH369> a woman <WH802> among the daughters <WH1323> of thy brethren <WH251>, or among all my people <WH5971>, that thou goest <WH1980> <WH8802> to take <WH3947> <WH8800> a wife <WH802> of the uncircumcised <WH6189> Philistines <WH6430>? And SHimshon <WH8123> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his father <WH1>, Get <WH3947> <WH8798> her for me; for she pleaseht me well <WH3474> <WH8804> <WH5869>.

But his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517> knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not that it was of the YY <WH3068>, that he sought <WH1245> <WH8764> an occasion <WH8385> against the Philistines <WH6430>: for at that time <WH6256> the Philistines <WH6430> had dominion <WH4910> <WH8802> over Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Then went <WH3381> SHimshon <WH8123> down <WH3381> <WH8799>, and his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517>, to Timnath <WH8553>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> to the vineyards <WH3754> of Timnath <WH8553>: and, behold, a young <WH3715> lion <WH738> roared <WH7580> <WH8802> against <WH7125> <WH8800> him.

And the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> came mightily <WH6743> <WH8799> upon him, and he rent <WH8156> <WH8762> him as he would have rent <WH8156> <WH8763> a kid <WH1423>, and he had nothing <WH3972> in his hand <WH3027>: but he told <WH5046> <WH8689> not his father <WH1> or his mother <WH517> what he had done <WH6213> <WH8804>.
And he went down <WH3381> <WH8799>, and talked <WH1696> <WH8762> with the woman <WH802>; and she pleased <WH3474> SHimshon <WH8123> well <WH3474> <WH8799> <WH5869>.

And after a time <WH3117> he returned <WH7725> <WH8799> to take <WH3947> <WH8800> her, and he turned aside <WH5493> <WH8799> to see <WH7200> <WH8800> the carcase <WH4658> of the lion <WH738>: and, behold, there was a swarm <WH5712> of bees <WH1682> and honey <WH1706> in the carcase <WH1472> of the lion <WH738>.

And he took <WH7287> <WH8799> thereof in his hands <WH3709>, and went on <WH3212> <WH8799> eating <WH398> <WH8800>, and came <WH1980> <WH8800> to his father <WH1> and mother <WH517>, and he gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them, and they did eat <WH398> <WH8799>: but he told <WH5046> <WH8689> not them that he had taken <WH7287> <WH8804> the honey <WH1706> out of the carcase <WH1472> of the lion <WH738>.
So his father <WH1> went down <WH3381> <WH8799> unto the woman <WH802>: and SHimshon <WH8123> made <WH6213> <WH8799> there a feast <WH4960>; for so used the young men <WH970> to do <WH6213> <WH8799>.
And it came to pass, when they saw <WH7200> <WH8800> him, that they brought <WH3947> <WH8799> thirty <WH7970> companions <WH4828> to be with him.

And SHimshon <WH8123> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, I will now put forth <WH2330> <WH8799> a riddle <WH2420> unto you: if ye can certainly <WH5046> <WH8687> declare <WH5046> <WH8686> it me within the seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> of the feast <WH4960>, and find it out <WH4672> <WH8804>, then I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> you thirty <WH7970> sheets <WH5466> and thirty <WH7970> change <WH2487> of garments <WH899>:

But if ye cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> declare <WH5046> <WH8687> it me, then shall ye give <WH5414> <WH8804> me thirty <WH7970> sheets <WH5466> and thirty <WH7970> change <WH2487> of garments <WH899>. And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Put forth <WH2330> <WH8798> thy riddle <WH2420>, that we may hear <WH8085> <WH8799> it.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Out of the eater <WH398> <WH8802> came forth <WH3318> <WH8804> meat <WH3978>, and out of the strong <WH5794> came forth <WH3318> <WH8804> sweetness <WH4966>. And they could <WH3201> <WH8804> not in three <WH7969> days <WH3117> expound <WH5046> <WH8687> the riddle <WH2420>.

And it came to pass on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, that they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto SHimshon's <WH8123> wife <WH802>, Entice <WH6601> <WH8761> thy husband <WH376>, that he may declare <WH5046> <WH8686> unto us the riddle <WH2420>, lest we burn <WH8313> <WH8799> thee and thy father's <WH1> house <WH1004> with fire <WH784>: have ye called <WH7121> <WH8804> us to take that we have <WH3423> <WH8800>? is it not so ?

And SHimshon's <WH8123> wife <WH802> wept <WH1058> <WH8799> before him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thou dost but hate <WH8130> <WH8804> me, and lovest <WH157> <WH8804> me not: thou hast put forth <WH2330> <WH8804> a riddle <WH2420> unto the children <WH1121> of my people <WH5971>, and hast not told <WH5046> <WH8689> it me. And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Behold, I have not told <WH5046> <WH8689> it my father <WH1> nor my mother <WH517>, and shall I tell <WH5046> <WH8686> it thee?

And she wept <WH1058> <WH8799> before him the seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, while their feast <WH4960> lasted <WH1961> <WH8804>: and it came to pass on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, that he told <WH5046> <WH8686> her, because she lay sore <WH6693> <WH8689> upon him: and she told <WH5046> <WH8686> the riddle <WH2420> to the children <WH1121> of her people <WH5971>.

And the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> before the sun <WH2775> went down <WH935> <WH8799>, What is sweeter <WH4966> than honey <WH1706>? and what is stronger <WH5794> than a lion <WH738>? And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, If <WH3884> ye had not plowed <WH2790> <WH8804> with my heifer <WH5697>, ye had not found out <WH4672> <WH8804> my riddle <WH2420>.

And the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> came <WH6743> <WH8799> upon him, and he went down <WH3381> <WH8799> to Ashkelon <WH831>, and slew <WH5221> <WH8686> thirty <WH7970> men <WH376> of them, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> their spoil <WH2488>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> change <WH2487> of garments unto them which expounded <WH5046> <WH8688> the riddle <WH2420>. And his anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799>, and he went up <WH5927> <WH8799> to his father's <WH1> house <WH1004>.
But SHimshon's <WH8123> wife <WH802> was given to his companion <WH4828>, whom he had used as his friend <WH7462> <WH8765>.
